name: 70 million
text: About 70 million Americans regularly listen to podcasts, according to Edison Media Research. People who listen weekly tend to spend five hours a week on them

name: 1 billion
text: In 2017, YouTube reported that people watched a billion hours on that service every day. On average, young Americans spend two hours a day watching video online.

name: 30 minutes
text: Instagram lifted Snapchatâ€™s video diary feature, Stories, to great success; more than 800 million people use Instagram, for more than 30 minutes a day on average
